title: 5 Things Poor People Do that the Rich Don’t (Attract WEALTH Today) EP: 1077
description:
In today's episode you will learn why working harder won’t make you richer, the right mindset for achieving success, how to think bigger in order to make more money, and so much more!

For more go to: www.lewishowes.com/1077
